messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

upgrade already done wednesday october pm re upgrade hello wanted let updated two ago please let thank wednesday october upgrade hello kind reminder please make update latest version assets highly critical perform upgrade by starting next upgrade pushed order update please follow steps more detailed guide found software center by searching software center search menu best endpoint agent install selected wait installation status becomes installed reboot computer icons newly installed endpoint tools please note during update process lose approximately minutes questions encounter difficulties upgrading please hesitate thank kind regards ext hub
